name: Maximus
description: Simple Fast Non Suspendable Userbot By @noobanon

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 mysession.py] in Termux or local system.

DATABASE_URL.description: This is for the database account, you can obtain it from mongodb.com.

LOGGER.description: Set to true if you want logger support.

LOGGER_GROUP.description: Set your private chat user id.

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: Set This True If you want pm auto ban.
